DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate micronutrient status malnourish elderly oral nutritional supplementation .
DOC.criteria: Age : equal 70 year AND : Weight loss equal 5 % one month OR weight loss equal 10 % 6 month OR BMI 18 21 OR albuminaemia 30 35 g/L OR MNASF le equal 7 Severe malnutrition Contraindication oral nutrition Severe pathologies Inflammatory syndrome ( CRP > 30 mg/L ) Severe dementia ( Mini Mental Score < 10 )
